item.title: Switching to Gitalk
item.description: Until now, this blog has been using Disqus as a comment mechanism. While it is very useful, I’m trying to switch to a less invasive (and I believe more privacy-safe): gitalk. I’ve left Disqus on in the pages on which users had already left comments. For other pages, Disqus is now deactivated.
